TopicTitle: parts list form vessel in editor

Articles.Content:
I got stuck again.

So to access the vessel parts list in flight one uses "FlightGlobals.ActiveVessel.parts". How does one access the vessel part's list in editor?

EditorLogic.sortedShipList

Note that when you first load into the editor and no parts have been placed trying to call this method will generate a nullRef that you'll have to error trap.

D.
Thanks. I'll be sure to catch that.
In case anyone else reads this. EditorLogic.fetch.ship.parts also gives a list of parts in editor.
